text: Tsebona is a genus of the plant family Sapotaceae described as a genus in 1962.Capuron, René Paul Raymond. 1962. Contributions à l'étude de la flore forestière de Madagascar. Adansonia: recueil périodique d'observations botanique, n.s. 2: 122Tropicos, Tsebona Capuron There is only one known species, Tsebona macrantha, endemic to Madagascar.Kew World Checklist of Selected Plant FamiliesAubréville, A. 1974. Sapotacees. Flore de Madagascar et des Comores family 164, pages 123-125 in French, full-page line drawing as illustration ==References== Category:Chrysophylloideae Category:Endemic flora of Madagascar Category:Monotypic Ericales genera Category:Sapotaceae genera
title: Tsebona
